why.title: Why Journaling Matters
why.subtitle: It’s not just writing — it’s how you clear your mind, grow emotionally, and stay grounded.

reflect.title: Self-Reflection
reflect.desc: Get thoughts out of your head and onto the page. See patterns. Understand yourself.

growth.title: Mental Growth
growth.desc: Writing regularly helps you process emotions, set goals, and move forward intentionally.

peace.title: Clarity & Peace
peace.desc: Journaling calms the chaos. It gives you clarity in a noisy world.

features.title: Powerful Features Built for You
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a private and meaningful journaling experience.

privacy.title: Private & Encrypted
privacy.desc: Your entries are end-to-end encrypted. Only you can read them.

dailyLogs.title: Daily Entries
dailyLogs.desc: Log your thoughts daily with simple, calming prompts.

insights.title: Track Your Growth
insights.desc: See patterns, moods, and progress over time.
